Text: Wow...everyone stuck below 50%, and no seeds....bummer.

The subs suck, but the audio and video is great. If your fluent in German, and you don't mind the subtitles, this torrent is a great choice. If you aren't then find a release with better subs.

I download the VLiS version on top of this, the video isn't nearly as good, but the subs make more sense and have better timing.

Also, I thought it was a very good movie. And no, they don't sparkle. ;)

ya download the -DECENT version thats up now, it only comes with romanian subs but they arent hardcoded and they link right to the english ones.  poorly timed subs are awful, and when they're hardcoded its a dealbreaker.
